title: How to Make Crumpet Pizzas

steps.headline: Spread each crumpet with the tomato sauce base.
Mix the grated cheese with the thyme and salt and pepper.
Place the cheese mix evenly across each crumpet.
Drizzle a little olive oil over the top of the cheese mix.
Arrange each crumpet on the baking tray (sheet).
Place in the oven.
steps.description: Bake at 200ºC for about 20 minutes or until the topping and crumpets have turned golden brown.

text: Spread each crumpet with the tomato sauce base.  Mix the grated cheese with the thyme and salt and pepper.  Place the cheese mix evenly across each crumpet.  Drizzle a little olive oil over the top of the cheese mix.  Arrange each crumpet on the baking tray (sheet).  Place in the oven. Bake at 200ºC for about 20 minutes or until the topping and crumpets have turned golden brown. Remove from the oven. Serve immediately.
